name: usgrnloop0
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls), wcel(c0, cumgr))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ USGraph, { s0 ∈ dom(c1)|(c1 ` s0)= { c2 } } = ∅, c0 ∈ UMGraph)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c0, cumgr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cumgr), wceq(crab(s0, cdm(c1), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csn(c2))), emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ USGraph → { s0 ∈ dom(c1)|(c1 ` s0)= { c2 } } = ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ USGraph → c0 ∈ UMGraph)
⊣ (c0 ∈ UMGraph → { s0 ∈ dom(c1)|(c1 ` s0)= { c2 } } = ∅)
